md:
giải nghĩa từ "elegance" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Elegance** (noun)

* Meaning: The quality of being graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.
* Vietnamese translation: Sự duyên dáng, sự sang trọng.

Example sentence: The elegance of the hotel lobby impressed all the guests.

* Related words: 
	+ Elegant (adjective): Having a pleasingly refined and dignified appearance or manner.
	+ Elegantly (adverb): In a refined and dignified manner.
	+ Elegantize (verb): To make something more elegant or refined.

Note: The word "elegance" can also refer to the quality of being refined and cultured in one's tastes and interests.

Elegance (noun)

  • Meaning: The quality of being graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.
  • Vietnamese translation: Sự duyên dáng, sự sang trọng.

Example sentence: The elegance of the hotel lobby impressed all the guests.

  • Related words:
    • Elegant (adjective): Having a pleasingly refined and dignified appearance or manner.
    • Elegantly (adverb): In a refined and dignified manner.
    • Elegantize (verb): To make something more elegant or refined.

Note: The word "elegance" can also refer to the quality of being refined and cultured in one's tastes and interests.
